Shivah:

"Like I said... you're looking as enemy who is your ally" replied 
Shivah "Decepticon are Predacons' ancestors and our allies in this 
war... If you wish to be alone, I leave you... YOur decepticon base 
is around and if you like to arrive soon follow this coordinates 
(Send to Ragnus the coordinates to the base)-Then Ragnus The Red, I 
leave you...  "

He did a small bow and started fly way of that place

--- In nbwrpg@y..., ragnus_@h... wrote:
> "I am Ragnus the Red, and your answer is unfortunate, for I am a 
> Decepticon.  But your luck holds today, for I am still slightly 
> weakened, and do not wish a battle.  Leave now and you may do so 
with 
> your life."  Ragnus said, very seriously.
> 
> 
> > Shivah:
> > 
> > "You're looking me as if I were your enemy and by now I don't" 
said 
> > Shivah while he trasnformed to his robot mode. "I'm Shivah... I'm 
a 
> > predacon and I owe my loyalty to BlackFortress's Master: Darkfate"
